title: Spooky statue
data:

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Spooky statues** are stationary monsters that attack by occasionally casting [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt") on you when you are in their [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). Unlike some [statues](/Statue "Statue"), they are not vulnerable to [wands of disintegration](/Wands_of_disintegration "Wands of disintegration"). They can be found in certain endings of [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt"), usually behind a small lake and guarding a small cache of treasure.

## Spells

| Spell set |                         |
| :-------- | ----------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt") |
| Slot2     | *none*                  |
| Slot3     | *none*                  |
| Slot4     | *none*                  |
| Slot5     | *none*                  |
| Slot6     | *none*                  |

## Tips & Tricks

- An [amulet of warding](/Amulet_of_warding "Amulet of warding") can help protect you from the summoned undead while you smash the statue to pieces.
- They can't see you (and thus can't haunt you) if you're [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible"). However, stepping into the water near them immediately makes you visible again. Fly over it while invisible to render these guys harmless.

## History

In [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") they were replaced with patrolling [curse skulls](/Curse_skull "Curse skull").

Spooky statue

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
spooky statue 8 
HP 70
HD 8
XP 602
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 1
Will Immune



Resistances rPois+, rF+, rC+, rElec,
rRot, rN+, rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat land
Intelligence High
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type clay golem, spooky statue
Flags Special ability
Stationary
Evil
You sense a ghostly presence around this statue, and it's not the slightest bit friendly.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Spooky statues are stationary monsters that attack by occasionally casting Haunt on you when you are in their line of sight. Unlike some statues, they are not vulnerable to wands of disintegration. They can be found in certain endings of the Crypt, usually behind a small lake and guarding a small cache of treasure.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Haunt
Slot2 none
Slot3 none
Slot4 none
Slot5 none
Slot6 none

Tips & Tricks

  • An amulet of warding can help protect you from the summoned undead while you smash the statue to pieces.
  • They can't see you (and thus can't haunt you) if you're invisible. However, stepping into the water near them immediately makes you visible again. Fly over it while invisible to render these guys harmless.

History

In 0.13 they were replaced with patrolling curse skulls.
